resources.string: "Revoke access to USB debugging from all computers you've previously authorised?"
USB debugging is intended for development purposes only. Use it to copy data between your computer and your device, install apps on your device without notification and read log data.
"Select Bluetooth audio codec: bits per sample"
Bluetooth audio LDAC codec: playback quality
"Select Bluetooth audio LDAC codec: playback quality"
"You're connected to %1$s, which can monitor your personal network activity, including emails, apps and websites."
Capture all Bluetooth HCI packets in a file

Stay fully aware of driving conditions and always obey applicable laws. Directions may be inaccurate, incomplete, dangerous, not suitable, prohibited or involve crossing administrative areas. Business information may also be inaccurate or incomplete. Data is not real time and location accuracy cannot be guaranteed. Do not handle your mobile device or use apps not intended for Android Auto while driving.
"Convert data partition to file-based encryption. !!Warning!! This will delete all your data. This feature is alpha, and may not work correctly. Press 'Wipe and convert…' to continue."

"The data limit that you set has been reached. You are no longer using mobile data.
If you resume, charges may apply for data usage."
These settings are intended for development use only. They can cause your device and the applications on it to stop working or behave incorrectly.
Force use of GPU for 2D drawing

"Your phone will automatically try to cool down. You can still use your phone, but it may run more slowly.
Once your phone has cooled down, it will run normally."
This input method may be able to collect all the text that you type, including personal data like passwords and credit card numbers. It comes from the app %1$s. Use this input method?
Install Android File Transfer application for Mac
"USB charging not supported. Only use the charger supplied."
Device will stay locked until you unlock manually

"If you do not enter the correct password within the next %s attempts, your phone will automatically reset to its factory settings and all information on the phone will be erased.
If your phone is reset, you'll need to enter the Google account information (email address and password) associated with this phone to be able to use it again."

"If you don't enter the correct password this time, your phone will automatically reset to its factory settings and all information on the phone will be erased.
If your phone is reset, you'll need to enter the Google account information (email address and password) associated with this phone to be able to use it again."
There were 5 failed fingerprint attempts. Please enter your password instead or wait 30 seconds before trying again.
There were 5 failed fingerprint attempts. Please enter your pattern instead or wait 30 seconds before trying again.
There were 5 failed fingerprint attempts. Please enter your PIN instead or wait 30 seconds before trying again.
"Incorrect SIM PIN. You must now input the SIM PUK code to unlock your device. Contact your carrier if the SIM PUK code is not available."
SIM is unusable. Please contact your carrier.
"You're connected to %1$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps and websites."
"You're connected to %1$s, which can monitor your personal network activity, including emails, apps and websites."

"Your work profile is managed by %1$s. The profile is connected to %2$s, which can monitor your work network activity, including emails, apps and websites.
You're also connected to %3$s, which can monitor your personal network activity."

"Your work profile is managed by %1$s. The profile is connected to %2$s, which can monitor your work network activity, including emails, apps and websites.
For more information, contact your admin."
"You're connected to %1$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps and websites."
Your organisation installed a certificate authority in your work profile. Your secure network traffic may be monitored or modified.
Your work profile is connected to %1$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps and websites.

"Your device is managed by your organisation.
Your admin can monitor and manage settings, corporate access, apps, data associated with your device and your device's location information.
For more information, contact your admin."
Your organisation installed a certificate authority on this device. Your secure network traffic may be monitored or modified.

"Your device is managed by %1$s.
Your admin can monitor and manage settings, corporate access, apps, data associated with your device and your device's location information.
For more information, contact your admin."
"You're connected to %1$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps and websites."
Your personal profile is connected to %1$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps and websites.
"You're connected to %1$s and %2$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps and websites."

"You gave an app permission to set up a VPN connection.
This app can monitor your device and network activity, including emails, apps and websites."

"Your work profile is managed by %1$s.
Your admin is capable of monitoring your network activity including emails, apps and websites.
For more information, contact your admin.
You're also connected to a VPN, which can monitor your network activity."

"With power notification controls, you can set an importance level from 0 to 5 for an app's notifications.
"Level 5" - Show at the top of the notification list - Allow full screen interruption - Always peek
"Level 4" - Prevent full screen interruption - Always peek
"Level 3" - Prevent full screen interruption - Never peek
"Level 2" - Prevent full screen interruption - Never peek - Never make sound and vibration
"Level 1" - Prevent full screen interruption - Never peek - Never make sound or vibrate - Hide from lock screen and status bar - Show at the bottom of the notification list
"Level 0" - Block all notifications from the app"
Your organisation may monitor network traffic in your work profile
Device is managed by your organisation
Your organisation manages this device and may monitor network traffic
Device is managed by your organisation and connected to %1$s
Device is managed by your organisation and connected to VPNs
"Taking screenshots isn't allowed by the app or your organisation"
Select logger sizes per log buffer
Show \"App not responding\" dialog for background apps
Flash hardware layers green when they are updated
Flash entire window surfaces when they are updated
Flash screen when apps perform long operations on main thread

"Your phone was too hot, so it turned off to cool down. Your phone is now running normally.
Your phone may get too hot if you: \u0009• Use resource-intensive apps (such as gaming, video or navigation apps) \u0009• Download or upload large files \u0009• Use your phone in high temperatures"
Affects the tone of the synthesised speech

This speech synthesis engine may be able to collect all the text that will be spoken, including personal data such as passwords and credit card numbers. It comes from the %s engine. Enable the use of this speech synthesis engine?
These experimental features may change, break or disappear in future releases. Proceed with caution.
System UI Tuner gives you extra ways to tweak and customise the Android user interface. These experimental features may change, break or disappear in future releases. Proceed with caution.
Check apps installed via ADB/ADT for harmful behaviour
Exit Do Not Disturb on volume up
Cannot select certificate automatically. Please select a certificate from the list, then try to connect.
No certificate available. Please install the certificate first
The password must be 8–64 characters long
Allow/disallow Wi-Fi roam scans based on the amount of data traffic present on the interface
Increase Wi‑Fi logging level, show per SSID RSSI in Wi‑Fi picker
The WAPI certificates do not exist. Please install them.
"You won't be disturbed by sounds and vibrations, except for alarms. You'll still hear anything you choose to play including music, videos and games."
"You won't be disturbed by sounds and vibrations, except for alarms, reminders, events and callers you specify. You'll still hear anything you choose to play including music, videos and games."
This blocks ALL sounds and vibrations, including from alarms, music, videos and games.
"This blocks ALL sounds and vibrations, including from alarms, music, videos and games. You'll still be able to make phone calls."
